title: Within the distance of 15 km
clause_text: Within the distance of 15 km. from boundary of the site, no Power Plant Machinery, Rock crushers, Heavy Machinery, Wind Mill shall be allowed. Within the distance of 5 km. from boundary of site, no non-reciprocating (rotating) power plant machinery and industrial machinery shall be allowed. Within the distance of 60 km. from the boundary of the site, no New Airport shall be proposed.
section: 1.0 LAND USE CLASSIFICATION AND PERMISSIBLE USES

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
